text:
#Epidemiologist and faculty @Jlguest  shares with Bloomberg TV @business the necessity of overcoming vaccine hesitancy & the logistical challenge of a worldwide #vaccine rollout. Watch the episode to hear from Dr. Jodie Guest (view at 1:30:52); https://t.co/jhlxcSA1Eh 
#COVID19 https://t.co/mU1SGPx7bq
